notesStmt.note: Menaḥem ben Mosheh: inscribed, folio 1r, among other illegible names. Folio 1r is a later decorated title page, printed and pasted on the front flyleaf.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
